caption: What an amazing dinner experience!!! Ashley and Tracy brought each of the food courses from the chef's tasting menu. Wesley took care of us by bringing the perfect wine for each portion. We've decided that the McNinch House needs to be on our REPEAT list.  🙂

We had a great time at McNinch! Ashley and Wesley were a real treat and very helpful!  We definitely regret not doing the wine pairings. It's pricey, but it's all about creating an experience and as they presented the food, I understood …
Simply an exceptional non-traditional culinary experience!!  From the beginning, all the way till the end.  Love when businesses focus on details.
Best fine dining in Charlotte. Wesley is a gem. This place is next level. Always look forward to the next time!

Let me preface this by stating my wife and I have been to multiple fine dining establishments across the us (NYC, Denver, LA and everywhere in between). This was by far the most exceptional culinary experience we’ve ever had. Even more …
Great place for romantic dinner, food is excellent. Bring your wallet, prices reflect the atmosphere and food

This dining experience was my favorite to date. We did the four courses with the wine pairing. It was perfection. Everything was amazing; the ambience, the service, the timing, the music, etc. I highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone!
I love all about McNinch, especially the asparagus soup!
The staff were outstanding, friendly and kind, My wife and I celebrated our 26th Anniversary here. Thank you. We will be back.
Fabulous as always!
We had a delightful time. The staff as well as the food was impeckable and the wine selection with each course was wonderful. I will most definitely be back!

If you are looking for a fine dining experience and elaborate ambience transporting you back in time.. McNinch House sets the benchmark. We were there to celebrate a birthday and we had the cognac room to ourselves. The meals served in …
Excellent spot for quality Quality Meals. Mood here is similar to Fresno's scene.

Me and my husband decided to go here last June for our anniversary and it was great! They treated us exceptionally well. The food was a bit pricey, but the whole experience was worth it. I would definitely recommend it.
quality meals, yeah, super tasty.
My fav spot for tasty Quality Meals. Do not leave if it's busy, it is worth it. Service is consistently above par. It has an awesome atmosphere.
One of my fav locations for delicious quality meals. Service treated us so kindly. It has a nice atmosphere.
quality meals here - great. certainly a top place in the area. service is typically great. prices are fair i would say. this place has many good reviews for a reason.
Excellent fine dining!  Service is impeccable.
Very unusual interior, excellent cuisine, first-class service.
Great 6 course dinner
We had a wonderful night here.  Even in the midst of COVID-19 and requesting a special dietary menu, the staff and chefs treated us like royalty.  Truly a night to remember and a great restaurant!

Best service and time I ever received in my life...went to celebrate my anniversary with my fiance last night and had the best date ever...course menu lasted about 3 hours long ...amazing time...btw ask for the seat by the front window

We chose this place for our anniversary on 6-27-2020. The atmosphere was wonderful and we felt as if we were dining in days of the Vanderbilt’s. From the very moments we stepped into the house until the time we departed, we were amazed. …

A culinary adventure that combines exceptional food, expertly curated wine, and an ambiance that's second to none in Charlotte. If you value food by volume or service by speed, this is not your place. This is where you go to spend an entire …
Yummy food!!!

My husband and I had an excellent dinner at McNinch House last night.  We have wanted to try this restaurant for many years and our anniversary was the perfect reason to go.  The ambiance, service, food and wine pairing made this meal an experience and a night to talk about for awhile!

I go to this nice place often! This is my favorite restaurant to pass a nice evening.  I go to this spot many times. The meals are very tasty, the crew is polite and the payment is affordable. I enjoy eating in this restaurant for a good meal.

I eat in this nice place quite often! This is my favorite place to pass a nice evening.  I visit this place routinely. The cooking is excellent, the staff is welcoming and the charge is affordable. I enjoy meeting in this spot for a decent lunch.
Everything was wonderful. The service, the food, the atmosphere....just fantastic! Do the 6 course, it's worth it!
This is an amazing place!!!! Thank you Wesley, Tracy and the chefs.

This would typically be out of our price range, but we decided to splurge for an early anniversary celebration.  We did a 6pm reservation on a Friday night. There was only one other couple there the entire time we were there (we left …
Absolute wow factor. This is such an incredible spot!
Awesome dinner in every way. Everything was impeccable - the ambience, service and FOOD!
WOW top notch!
Finest dining experience in Charlotte.

You don’t get any better than this for fine dining in Charlotte. Superb food. Knowledgeable staff. All in a meticulously restored 19th century mansion in the heart of Charlotte. There’s nothing else like this and well worth the splurge.
Amazing atmosphere perfect for an anniversary
Extremely Expensive
My name is James McNinch.. I'm from Alpena,Arkansas. Just curious....
This was a wonderful experience and the food and wine were great! Staff was very attentive.

Greatest restaurant I have ever been to. Fantastic experience. Food is beyond expectations, far more than your common high end fare. The chef creates flavors and dishes that will wow your palette - I remember the flavors with fondness even …
Awesome food and service Very special
Outstanding scene for quality Quality Meals. the food was tasty. it has a nice interior. atmosphere and food reminds me of virginia beach.

A classic, vintage ambiance set in a house turned historic landmark, paired with the chef's tasting menu and Bourdeaux wine complement, made for the perfect belated birthday dinner. The best way to describe a dining experience at McNinch is to feel lost in a dining whirlwind of pure
We attended a wedding there. The food was ok. I wish there was a better selection of entrees. It seemed liked everything took a long time for the ceremony and dinner.
Got the Chefs table. Everything was delicious.  The Chef was a delight and was great to speak to and ask questions . Thanks for making our night.

Enjoyable experience, all around.  The venue is quaint, and steeped in history.  The service was very good. The food was delicious, and combined some creative and lively flavors.  All in all, we'll be back.
quality meals... yummy. Prices were fair.
EXCELLENT, SUPERB, MAGNIFICENT
This is a very special place. Great place to visit with that special someone. Wes made the evening even more special. We're big fans of the  McNinch!
An experience for sure!
Had a exceptionally wonderful 5 course dinner. Wine was paired & inspired with care. Ambience was excellent & cosy.
I dont get it. The food here was not good. The wine was ok. The service was decent. The prices are ridiculous!
Beautiful historic setting for fine dining...Charlotte at best...
One of the best restaurant experiences I've ever had! Impeccable service, amazing food,  friendly and knowledgeable wait staff. Beautiful dining room. I can't wait to go back!
Wow.....I am speechless
Yeah.  This place is awesome.
Great romantic place.

My girlfriend and I dined at the McNinch House earlier tonight and were extremely disappointed in all aspects. To start with, we had a reservation at 5:30, left at 7:30 and were the only table in the entire place the whole stent of our …
Food and service is fantastic if you haven't tried it on your list.

The food was magnificent however the service at the end was not what I expected at a 4/5 star fine dining restaurant. I feel that there were too many waiters and waitresses that were handling our table, I requested that my entree and desert …
Top notch food, service and atmosphere! Bring your check book!
I left wanting more. While the service was good and the building lovely, the food was so-so. The tartare was a complete letdown. I love fine dining however I will not return to this establishment.

Top notch service and incredible food. The sommelier knew exactly the wine to pair with our dishes (he even had non-alcoholic wines for my pregnant wife). You don’t feel “rushed” at  McNinch House like you will with other restaurants. A great value for an excellent fine dining experience.
Wonderful in every way!
Very curteous staff and want to ensure the clientele are having a good time.  Awesome surrounding and history.
Food is phenomenal. Great date spot!

It's hard to put into a limited charactered message how amazing my wife and my experience was at the McNinch house. Everything was beyond expectations that we had read: staff, service, food, and venue. I am glad to have the pleasure of dining here. Thank you to all that run this place!

Absolutely AMAZING New Year's Chef's Tasting Menu.  To celebrate the end of an amazing year with my wife, this was perfect.  The service is friendly and excellent, the food was EXQUISITE, superb wines, beautifully decorated..........really, …
Spectacular meal. Wine pairings were brilliant.
Great experience.
Incredible food and amazing service.
Its expensive, but a great place to splurge for a special occasion. 5-7-9 course meals
"Great staff, good food, and good prices."
Great wine pairings. Food was great, maybe over priced though.
Fantastic place for dates, special occasions, or just a fancy meal.  The food and service are excellent, and the atmosphere is great!  Expensive, but worth it.
Beautiful Victorian home, excellent and beautifully presented food.

One of the most memorable dining experiences ever. The prix fixe menu was outstanding and the service was great! We got the 5 course and every course was delicious to the very last bite. Enjoyed every minute of our 3 hour dining experience. …

Our first visit, used a Groupon, and we're not overt 'foodies' by any stretch.  McNinch House offers a 'dining experience' more than simply a nice dinner.  We did the wine pairing service, and were very pleased with each course and its …

3.5 hours of very average food.  Upon arrival, we were told there was a wedding taking place and we needed to wait on the porch for a while....We ordered a bottle of wine and watched a group of small unaccompanied children run around while …
A must if you expect the best

Was not impressed…The food was good…but not spectacular which is what I expected. Service was a bit on the slow side.  The appetizer was very small…2 bites and was not memorable The salad was very good but 5 bites was all I got..  My dates …
High quality, great tasting food, all 5 (or7) courses.  You'll feel you are well fed, but don't expect to feel "stuffed".  For VERY special occasions.

My husband and I went to the McNinch house on the evening of March 5, 2015 to celebrate our wedding anniversary.  The wine steward was friendly and shared much history of the house which was very interesting and entertaining.  The staff was …

I really wanted to like this place.  They couldn't find our reservation, though they confirmed by phone earlier in the day and the day before.  So we stood in the foyer awkwardly for a while.  We added the wine pairing to our meal and the …

I was with a table of 9 celebrating a birthday.  We got the 9 course meal.  The food was nothing spectacular.  For $125 per person for the food, I expect every bite to blow me away.  It did not.  In all the bill for 9 people came to over …

We dined at the Mcninch House recently after hearing so many great reviews. I have to say the best part about the place is the place itself. Very quaint old Victorian home! The food was not what I expected to be, bland and just ok. After …

My wife and I have been coming to McNinch House Restaurant to celebrate special occasions for about 2.5 years now, and we are consistently very happy.  The service is excellent, Wesley will make sure that you have excellent wines paired …
They have amazing appetizers in this place. When we was seated and given our appetizers we were already satisfied and already having fun. This place is magical.
Eclectic and fascinating! In an historic home near uptown. Each course is presented with a floral garnish and always on different china. The food is excellent and divinely presented.
